input.sentences: the first sight we saw in location was the location location location wheel .
the double decker busses dotted the highway too .
perfect location with a bus and big [male] in the same photo .
the thames is magnificent and beautiful under the gloomy sky .
the organization organization organization has the greatest architecture imaginable !
output.sentences: I'm heading to a location near the big ferris wheel and the boat ride over offerd a beautiful sight.
I'm glad I rode the boat because Tracy took the highway route on the double-decker bus with a bad driver who couldn't stay on his side of the dotted lines.
I tried making Tracy jealous of my perfect boat trip by telling her about the sexy male that sat next to me but it would have worked better if I had snapped a photo for proof.
Though I didn't end up with a photo of the sexy male I did get a magnificent shot of the sky over the Thames river.
The amount of organization, hard work, and planning that must have went into building that architecture is unimaginable we thought as we took one last look at the massive structure.
